definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: I would like to discuss the price of Indonesian Beige materials of your company.
sentences.chinese: 想跟您商量一下貴公司印尼米黃荒料的價格。

sentences.english: Dave or Kathy are not go to steal apart on vacation.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫和凱茜商量在假期裏偷偷跑出去。

sentences.english: Many experts have been called in for advice.
sentences.chinese: 許多專家被請來商量對策。

sentences.english: And would you ask if the rent is still negotiable or not?
sentences.chinese: 還有，可不可以問問租金是否仍有商量餘地呢？

sentences.english: If rent longer than 12 month, the rent is on request.
sentences.chinese: 如果租期需超過12個月，需與房東商量，另議。

sentences.english: How to just want to consult with Luan school let Yao Zhenzhen be dead.
sentences.chinese: 自己來只是想和欒學堂商量怎麼讓姚珍珍死心。

sentences.english: Then they discussed how to achieve them.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們商量如何實現這些目標。

sentences.english: The lion king called the twelve zodiac meeting to discuss what row seating.
sentences.chinese: 獅子大王召集十二生肖開會，商量排座次的事。

sentences.english: That you may settle with your host.
sentences.chinese: 那你可以跟你的主人商量。

sentences.english: There was no time to lose, and no time to discuss the matter with the family.
sentences.chinese: 情況緊急，危急萬分，沒有時間與家人商量了。

sentences.english: Our project ought to proceed at a reasonably quick tempo. Surely one month is ample time, isn't it?
sentences.chinese: 那個商量必需儘速停止。唯一月的時間因該夠了吧？

sentences.english: Dong Jun and Li Li are colleagues. They are discussing how to spend the Spring Festival holiday.
sentences.chinese: 董軍和李莉是同事，他們在商量如何過春節。

sentences.english: A: Tim, I need to work out a time to get together with your people to discuss the new project.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆，我要找個時間跟你們商量一下新的方案。

sentences.english: Now the situation has lost its survival soil.
sentences.chinese: 過去那種“暴利”沒商量的行情已失去了生存土壤。

sentences.english: It might be as well to consult Magnus and Mrs . Derrick.
sentences.chinese: 還是找曼克奈斯和臺力克太太去商量吧。

sentences.english: She could consult with her brother, could receive her sister-in-law on her arrival, and treat her with proper attention;
sentences.chinese: 她遇事能同哥哥商量着辦，嫂子來了能以禮相待。

definition: to agree/to decide after consultation/to come to a compromise
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to answer/to respond/to answer positively/to agree/to accept/to promise
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
clapper-board/auctioneer's hammer/to beat time with clappers
to persuade/to convince/to talk sb over/Taiwan pr. [shui4 fu2]
